channel.title: Portal limitations
channel.description: Does anyone know how to put limitations on portals like in castle wars? I want only 8 people to be able to go into the portal then have it say "portal is full"

item.title: Portal limitations
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

under the case of the object or where ever you defined the “Portal Full Message” add a if statement
I may be wrong…
Consider this as a thought up example

Object file
Case 9999: //This is Object ID
if (p.rights > 0) {
getPA().moveplayer(2323, 2323, 0);
{ else if (p.rights < 0)
sendMessage(“The Portal Is Full”);
break;

That’s just a start for help i don’t even know if thats formatted correctly but the main point is to define who you want to use it.
examples:
(p.rights)
(p.donor)
and so on, hope this helps out in a way.

Read full topic
